title: Chinese characters
content:
Can any one read these Chinese characters on this photoengraving plate? I flipped the image so hopefully it is in the correct position.   
 ![chinese.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071120081028im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/16519.jpg)   
   
Thanks,   
gln

author: gln

comments.content: It says "Merry christmas and happy new year"!
